data.title: Brands, Data & Expertise
data.meta_description: Hassle free insurance, for real life products and activities, for the businesses that provide them and the customers who buy them.
data.text:
BRANDS.

Zing is only available to the customers of our exclusive network of partner brands and retailers, so look out for the Zing logo when shopping with leading brands to get access to the club.

DATA.

We work with our partner brands and retailers to capture better data about the possessions you insure with us, so we can proactively deal with re-valuations, servicing, care and more.

EXPERTISE.

We're specialists so, if you need to make a claim you'll speak to one of our knowledgeable claims managers. In the case of repair or replacement, you’ll benefit from our network of expert partner brands and retailers.

Brand Partnerships.

You’ll find Zing when shopping with leading brands, but our partnership with those brands goes way beyond the checkout.

We work together with our partner brands to work out what’s most important to you, our members.

Claims, Redefined.

When it comes to claims, we work with our partner brands to ensure you get a claims experience that’s as close as possible to a renewed shopping experience.
